title: Analysis of Online Education Method Preferences and Social Learning Integration Design: Asynchronous and Synchronous Learning Models

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level professional knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience, including an understanding of educational systems and digital literacy
context.additional_context: A teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers. Current professionals must balance work and learning. Digital devices and collaboration tools are available. Educational curriculum design considers community engagement and cultural diversity.

learning_goals: Learners analyze the strengths and weaknesses of asynchronous/synchronous online education modes to select approaches suitable for social interaction and work environments

Learners develop educational strategies considering learner flexibility (time management) and interaction (real-time feedback) when designing PBL projects, incorporating civic engagement and collaborative culture
Through team-based activities, learners develop blended online learning scenarios and evaluate them in terms of educational effectiveness and social relationship formation
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
